pageContext.claim: “It had nothing to do with me. So I don't think so, because there was no crime. You know, it's 'high crimes and…' not 'with' or 'or.' It's 'high crimes and misdemeanors.' There was no high crime and there was no misdemeanor. So how do you impeach based on that?”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is wrong to suggest that a statutory crime is required for the House to bring impeachment charge. One of the articles of impeachments approved against Richard Nixon involved his failure to respond to congressional subpoenas.
